summary:
I am a researcher at Livestock and Environment department of Wageningen Livestock Research at WUR. My specialization is in Agricultural mechanization and I am applying my knowledge in applications related to improving environmental and energy consumption on livestock farms, specifically related to manure management at cattle and pig farms.  I am interested in exploring the use of technology and management knowledge not only for the sake of higher production but also for the planet's sake. I am involved in both Dutch and international projects. 

*EDUCATION
-2005-2009 Bachelor of Science, University of Tehran. Grade: 16.75 of 20.
-2009-2011 Master of Science, University of Tehran. Grade: 19.33 of 20.
-Thesis: Management and optimization of energy use in dairy and poultry egg farms by applying fuzzy optimization methods-case study: Rey and Karaj cities- Grade: 19.63 of 20.
-2012-2017- PhD, University of Tehran. Grade: 18.6 of 20.
Thesis: Simulation, project management and control of biogas production in a target dairy farm.
2016_2017: Guest researcher at Wageningen University and research- developing a business case model for manure management 
2019-present: Researcher at Wageningen Livestock Research, Wageningen University and Research
*Honors
-2013 The first rank in PhD entrance exam.
-2010 The third rank in M.Sc. entrance exam.
-2012 Top student of M.Sc. Level in 2010-2012
-2012 Best Researcher Student at the University of Tehran in 2012

RESEARCH INTERESTS
• Mechanization and Innovation in agriculture
• Energy analysis in agriculture
• Renewable energy/ Biogas and biofuels systems
• Environmental analysis/Life cycle assessment
• Modeling and optimization
• Project Management
• Financial Analysis
• Dairy farming
• Waste management

* More than 24 Published Papers in Scientific Journals and International Conferences

* 14 Published papers in National Conferences

* 1 published book and 1 published book chapter

* Others:
- Member of the Scientific Committee and the Executive Board of the 9th National Congress of Agricultural Machinery (Mechanical Engineering of Biosystem) and Mechanization, University of Tehran, Iran
-Member of the student’s scientific association of agricultural machinery Engineering, Iran
-Member of National Elites Foundation, Presidency of Islamic Republic of Iran
-Member of Young Elites Scientific Group, Iran
-Member of Young Researchers Club, IAU, Iran
-Member of Women Scientists of The Islamic World
-Lecturer at IAU, Iran
-Lecturer at University of Tehran

treasury_media.title: 𝗠𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗿𝗲: 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗺𝗲𝗮𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 💩📝🌍
treasury_media.description:
"Livestock farming produces a lot of this greenhouse gas, so we need to reduce these emissions. You can pull various levers, but which has the biggest impact? We need unambiguous measurements to know for sure." In the M4Models project, André Aarnink and Paria Sefeedpari from Wageningen Livestock Research aim to find better measurement methods and predictive models to reduce emissions from manure. 
Read the interview about this EU research 👉 https://lnkd.in/eXCrZf-U
